alert.note: Alert for Chase (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 23 at 8:15PM CDT until May 27 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River near Florence affecting Marion County. Cottonwood River at Cottonwood Falls affecting Chase County. Cottonwood River near Plymouth affecting Lyon and Chase Counties. For the Cottonwood River...including Florence, Cottonwood Falls, Plymouth...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River at Cottonwood Falls. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Water covers fields and some rural roads along the river. Low areas along the south bank at the gage site begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday morning to a crest of 9.8 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Cottonwood River Cottonwood Fall 9.0 MSG unknown 6.8 9.8 8.4 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
